page.title: 05FARMING IN WOOLMER GREEN
page.content: We went to Mardleybury farm. The farmer,{Mr Sapsed,}owns 500 acres of land. Two_thirds of his farm is used for cereals, the rest is for livestock grazing.He employs one person full-time and one person part-time to work on the farm. On his land he keeps beef cattle, which have won him more than{2,000 {rosettes.}Half of Mr Sapsed's animals go to the slaughter house. He takes his cattle to Hertford Cattle Market every year.Mr Sapsed was the President of the Hertford Cattle Society (White-faced).He grows wheat and barley,but he also buys in food for his cattle.On his farm he uses: tractors, cultivators, drills, and he has his own combine harvester.
